author: adminelevation
install_msg: Triage integration for malware analysis and autoscan. Use `[p]help triage` for commands.
name: triageanalysis
description: Integrate with tria.ge for malware analysis, autoscan, and moderation actions.
end_user_data_statement: This cog may store sample IDs, scan results, and user actions for moderation and logging purposes. No personal data is shared with third parties.
